Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. What can I do for 
you today?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good morning. Everyone in this
town is so nice. It seems like a
wonderful place to raise my daughter.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good morning. <MYNAME>, if you ever
want to travel, please let me know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Charles is a good pilot and you're sure
to have a pleasant trip.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I came as you asked,
but this seems like a very nice place
to live.
<PAGE>
I've been to many countries, so I know
what I'm talking about.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Isn't my daughter
Hina so cute? She looks just like
me when I was young.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>She's going to grow up to look like me.
I'm so looking forward to it.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello. You're working on the farm
today?
<PAGE>
When the farm is doing well, we get to
enjoy fresh produce, so please do your
best.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. What brings you 
here so late?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening. You build things 
around town, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Well then, please don't leave things on
the ground that children can trip over.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I mean, it would be terrible if Hina
should trip. So promise me that, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. Is it okay for you to be
out walking so late? Will you be able
to wake up in the morning?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. There's not a cloud in the 
sky today. It's the perfect day to
travel.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>The views are spectacular if you fly on
a day like this.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Too bad it's raining today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Charles loves the outdoors, so he hates
rain. He's like a little boy in some
ways.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Thank goodness it cleared
up today. I have so much washing to do.
<PAGE>
The clothes dry so quickly, thanks to
this summer weather. You should do
some laundry too, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What are you doing in the
rain?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Huh? It's hot, and the rain feels
good? Don't be silly. Dry yourself off.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, it's been getting cool, 
hasn't it? Every day is so comfortable.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, you're cheerful even on 
rainy days, aren't you? Can I have
some of your energy?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Hina is so happy because of 
all the snow. I just hope she doesn't
catch a cold.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You seem excited that it's
snowing. You look like a puppy.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You're outdoors even in a
typhoon? That's so dangerous.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>The shops are closed today, so you'd
better hurry home.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You're outdoors even in a
blizzard? That's so dangerous.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>The shops are closed today, so you'd
better hurry home.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I heard the news. <MYNAME>. There's
someone special in your life now.
<PAGE>
Strategy is important in love. So be
sure to always take the initiative.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This might become a popular travel
destination. Maybe I should plan a tour.
People from other towns might visit.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hina said the forest is so much fun!
There certainly is lots of nature and
plenty to enjoy.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm working, I get the urge to come
to a place like this. It's a nice change
of scenery.
<PAGE>
I'm so glad we moved here because I
can easily walk here anytime I want.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm in the travel business, so I've been
to many places.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>There aren't many places overflowing
with nature like this. I hope the people
of this town are proud.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Maybe I'll come hiking here with Hina
and Charles. The view is wonderful.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
People in town are saying that someone
has been throwing things into the lake.
Do you know anything about that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I wish they wouldn't spoil the scenery
around here. It's so beautiful.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You have such a big farm, <MYNAME>. Can I 
use it as a runway for our company?
Well?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I see. That's too bad. I could expand
operations with something this big.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd never seen a farm until we came
here. Hmm...So this is what it looks
like.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's dark here. The footing isn't safe
and people could get hurt, so you have
to be careful.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I love jewels, but a mine isn't my cup
of tea... The smell in the air is so
strong it's giving me a headache.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think people are going to start coming
to this town.
<PAGE>
And for that to happen, <MYNAME>, you must
do your best.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is gotten quite lively. 
<MYNAME>, you really worked hard.
<PAGE>
But this town will grow much more and I
have lots of hope.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad we moved to this town. I never
expected it to be so wonderful.
<PAGE>
Hina's going to grow up in this town, so
she's very lucky.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just who is Dunhill person? It was
because of his words we decided to come
here.
<PAGE>
He was so convincing. He's not ordinary
person. I'm so curious.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is there anything unusual in this town?
I love to collect unusual things.
<PAGE>
Whenever Charles goes away for business,
I ask him to bring back unusual things
for me and I get so excited.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
At our travel agency, Charles is the
pilot and I work in the office.
<PAGE>
In reality, I run the company. I want
Charles to fly as long as he can, and
don't bother him with petty things.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hina says we are the world's greatest
parents. Isn't that a cute thing to say?
<PAGE>
We'll do anything for Hina. We even
moved here for her sake.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you're feeling stressed, it's good to
take a trip. It rejuvenates you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>For some people, it can be a life-
changing experience. It might even
change you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why I married Charles?
<PAGE>
He tells me he can't live without me,
so I stay with him.
<PAGE>
When I was young, I was so popular, I
could barely manage.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Charles also couldn't resist me. Heh
heh.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks to you, <MYNAME>, we're able to
live comfortably in this town.
<PAGE>
The entire family is grateful to you.
If you ever have problems on your trip,
don't hesitate to call me.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Mushroom spaghetti for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I love this. However, will the taste 
satisfy me? Let me try it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>...Delicious. The seasoning is perfect.
Thank you.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what is it? This is for me?
<PAGE>
You do the cutest things, <MYNAME>.
I gladly accept.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is for me? What is it?
<PAGE>
Heh heh, how nice. Thank you, I'm very
happy.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm happy for the gesture, <MYNAME>, but 
think about the person you give a gift
to. Just what do you think of me?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ack!
<PAGE>
What is it you're holding? Do you enjoy
making me upset? I misjudged you.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I've received tons of present in my
life, but never one so awful!
<PAGE>
Who would want to eat something like a
sea urchin rice bowl?! I haven't been
this upset in a long time!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
These are strawberries, <MYNAME>? Look
how big they are.
<PAGE>
I've seen many strawberries during my
travels, but rarely ones this big.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have the ingredients for my next meal.
With this much, my daughter will be
happy too. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What are these? Toys? Huh? These are
strawberries?!
<PAGE>
Are you kidding? They don't even get
this big in a dream. They're huge.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Charles and Hina will be so shocked.
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I gladly accept.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm amazed you grew such huge ones. I'm
really impressed. These are for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Oh my, I've got a dilemma now. How can I
cook them?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not in the mood right now. Please
save your present for another time.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. But you already gave me one
today. So why don't you give it to
someone else?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, is this...my birthday present?
<PAGE>
It's mushroom spaghetti. I'm so pleased.
However, I must taste it!
<PAGE>
Mmmm...this is delicious. As much as I
hate to admit it, it is good.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? Heh heh...thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I've been getting all sorts of gifts
from all over the world since morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>And your present is my favorite among
them all, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How did you know it was my birthday? Did
Charles tell you?
<PAGE>
Is this a present? Thank you, <MYNAME>.
I accept.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? Thank you. You 
must notice even the little things. I'll
bet you're very popular, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
For me, it's special when my family
honors me on my birthday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>And to give me a present like this...
You have ruined my entire day. What are
you going to do about it?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Is this some complaint against me? How
can you give such a thing on someone's
birthday?! Think about the other person!

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
A sea urchin rice bowl isn't a birthday
present. It's my most-hated dish!
<PAGE>
Never mind. I shouldn't have had such
high hopes. I was wrong about you.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why, thank you. Strawberries, are the
perfect birthday gift for me.
<PAGE>
So big and lovely... Just like me.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a big birthday present. Thank you,
<MYNAME> I'm going to cook up something
special for my family.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? W-What a surprise.
I've never seen such big strawberries.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I used to dream of eating huge
strawberries, and now that it's a 
reality. It's just too much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>No, I'm just kidding. I feel like
jumping for joy. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this what you call a mutation? I've
never seen anything this big.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What? A birthday present? Something so
precious? Really? Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
And what about this? Heh heh... You
do such childish things.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you showing me this? Heh
heh... You do such childish things.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a big bird, but that's about all.
I was expecting something more.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are dogs everywhere. It's nothing
unusual.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What use is a dog that's so out of 
shape? This is a farm. Shape up.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't let this dog get close to Hina.
It would be terrible if she's bitten.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, she can't run. You must make her
lose some weight.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh...how cute.<RED>∀</RED>. This lovable
face is irresistible. I'd love to see
her again.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look at this cute, chubby cat. I want to
make her my pillow and snuggle up to
her.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Uh...no, no. My reputation would suffer.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat is so graceful and its fur is
so lovely. Why, she's a lot like me. I
like her.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Heh heh...hah hah hah! How funny.
She's so fat, her face is stretched
out.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, a present for the Flower Festival?
Well, thank you. I will be sure to
display it.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today is Children's Day. You're so funny
to give me candy for a present, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
But it turns out I'm hungry, so I'm
going to accept. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A blue shuttlecock... Charles proposed
when we were flying across the sky.
<PAGE>
I had never received such a romantic
proposal, so I accepted right away.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, how nostalgic. I wonder how many
dozens of rings I've received from
suitors.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you feed her to get her used to you?
She's seems to like  you very much.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When I'm in the forest, she peeks her
head out often, and that's so cute.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, here is a birthday present from 
me. Trust me, it's a real treat to get
a present from me.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Today is your birthday, <MYNAME>?
Well then, happy birthday.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>. You must value
your neighbors. If people forget about
you, that's your fault.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please come to Camellia Travel for all
your travel needs. I'm sure you will be
very satisfied.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Michelle's magic show is so fun to
watch. And it's certainly popular.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I'm sorry. I'm in the middle of my
lunch.
<PAGE>
Please wait a bit. I'm almost done.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A red bench is so pretty. I just love
the color red.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a lovely table. I've seen something
like it in some foreign country.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a tea table. The bright red
color is so pretty.
<PAGE>
Just once, I'd like to drink tea
at a table like that.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The flames of a beacon makes the
surroundings so surreal.
<PAGE>
As I gaze at it, I almost feel as though
I'm dreaming.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a stone lantern which gives the
surroundings an Eastern-vibe. It really
makes an impact. I like it.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a sun statue! I'm going to take
in the energy of the sun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Aaah...this feels good. Can I have some
time to myself for a bit?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a cute fountain. It's perfect for a
small garden.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you get this daruma?
Especially one this big?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I love darumas, so please have lots and
lots of them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You should even place them all over
town.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How unusual, a pine decoration. I saw it
in front of homes in a country
I visited long ago.
<PAGE>
I'm sure it was around the new year. It
must be an old tradition.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an elegant bamboo fountain. You
certainly have fine taste.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a large stone marker, I wonder
if something is written on it?
<PAGE>
It must be some kind of ancient writing.
The mystery is fascinating. I love this
type of thing.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That ride looks like fun. I'm sure Hina
would want to get on it.
<PAGE>
Maybe even Charles would want to ride
it.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A mechanical lion, how unusual. I
think Hina would be afraid of it.
<PAGE>
I bet Charles would want to ride it
though...

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The panda ride is cute. I think Hina
would enjoy that.
<PAGE>
Maybe even Charles would too...

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area is a bit unusual. It feels
exotic.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I like this kind of atmosphere.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area is a bit unusual and
interesting. It feels exotic.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I like this kind of atmosphere.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has some interesting things
and a nice atmosphere. It feels exotic.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I like this kind of atmosphere.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love how sunflowers are so fancy.
Large flowers are very attractive.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love red roses like that. Everyone
in my family likes roses.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White roses are nice too. They look so
pure. But they seem difficult to
coordinate them with other colors.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Snow drops are in bloom. Small, white
flowers are so dainty.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the past, you'd find gentian blooming
on the roadside, but these days, you
don't see them much.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love how sunflowers are so fancy.
Large flowers are very attractive.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love red roses like that. Everyone
in my family likes roses.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's nice to have lots of hydrangeas.
The pale purple color is indescribable.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Nadeshiko flowers are so unassuming,
yet so lovely.
<PAGE>
Oh, that's right. Charles said that I'm
like a nadeshiko flower.
<PAGE>
That was a long time ago.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White roses are nice too. They look so
pure. But they seem difficult to
coordinate them with other colors.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Snow drops are in bloom. Small, white
flowers are so dainty.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the past, you'd find gentian blooming
on the roadside, but these days, you
don't see them much.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo is nice because it grows so
straight. But does it have flowers?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cherry blossoms are nice. Even as a
potted plant, the flowers are bright and
lovely to look at.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo is nice because it grows so
straight. But does it have flowers?

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cherry blossoms are pretty. I think
everyone is eyeing this spot for
flower-viewing.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Since there's a lattice, let's grow
roses.
<PAGE>
Red climbing roses would look so pretty.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A red flower arch is lovely. Especially
with roses.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A flower arch is lovely. As for blue
blossoms, I'd go for blue roses and
magic blue grass.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A red fence is nice. I like the color
red.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White fences are nice because they
look so pristine.

Now's not the time to exchange
gifts.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You need a beauty parlor in town, after
all. I wish I could come every day, but
that's not possible.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's nice to have a lot of clothing
shops, but once I find a place that I
like, I tend to stick to it.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I find a restaurant I can't help
but go in.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please leave all your travel needs to
our travel agency. I promise you
wonderful memories.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The tea at tea salons is always so
delicious. And of course, the desserts.
But remember...eat in moderation.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Moving is so difficult. It wouldn't
be so bad if you could just pack
everything on a plane and jet off.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's gratifying when the town grows and
the customers increase. It's also nice
when more shops crop up.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A Western motif in town is nice. There
are lots of places like that here, so I
love it.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An Eastern themed town is very
calming. It's perfect for taking walks.
